
{{alias}}( [encoding,] clbk )
    Reads data from `stdin`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    encoding: string|null
        String encoding. If set, data will be returned as an encoded `string`.

    clbk: Function
        Callback invoked upon reading all data from `stdin`.

    Examples
    --------
    > function onReadBuffer( error, data ) {
    >     if ( error ) {
    >         throw error;
    >     }
    >     console.log( data.toString() );
    >     // returns '...'
    > };
    > {{alias}}( onReadBuffer );

    // Set encoding:
    > function onReadString( error, data ) {
    >     if ( error ) {
    >         throw error;
    >     }
    >     console.log( data );
    >     // returns '...'
    > };
    > {{alias}}( 'utf8', onReadString );
